exceptions.tactic: intros xs ps x H1 H2.
apply has_all_true in H3; try auto.
apply mapP in H3 as [a Ha ->].

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
xs: seq (nid * bool)
ps: seq nat_eqType
x: Equality.sort nat_eqType

Goal:
perm_eq [seq i.1 | i <- xs] ps -> x \in ps -> exists b : bool_eqType, (x, b) \in xs

Premises:
bool_eqType = EqType bool bool_eqMixin : eqType
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
Notation seq := list
perm_eq = fun (T : eqType) (s1 s2 : seq T) => all [pred x | count_mem x s1 == count_mem x s2] (s1 ++ s2) : forall T : eqType, seq T -> seq T -> bool Arguments perm_eq {T} (_ _)%seq_scope
nid = nat : Set
nat_eqType = EqType nat nat_eqMixin : eqType
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
has_all_true : forall (xs : seq (nat_eqType * bool)) (ps : seq nid) (x : nat_eqType), perm_eq [seq i.1 | i <- xs] ps -> all id [seq i.2 | i <- xs] -> x \in ps -> (x, true) \in xs
mapP : reflect (exists2 x0 : ?T1, x0 \in ?s & ?y = ?f x0) (?y \in [seq ?f i | i <- ?s]) where ?T1 : [xs : seq (nid * bool) ps : seq nat_eqType x : nat_eqType |- eqType] ?T2 : [xs : seq (nid * bool) ps : seq nat_eqType x : nat_eqType |- eqType] ?f : [xs : seq (nid * bool) ps : seq nat_eqType x : nat_eqType |- ?T1 -> ?T2] ?s : [xs : seq (nid * bool) ps : seq nat_eqType x : nat_eqType |- seq ?T1] ?y : [xs : seq (nid * bool) ps : seq nat_eqType x : nat_eqType |- Equality.sort ?T2]
perm_iotaP : forall x0 : ?T, let It := iota 0 (size ?t) in reflect (exists2 Is : seq nat_eqType, perm_eq Is It & ?s = [seq nth x0 ?t i | i <- Is]) (perm_eq ?s ?t) where ?T : [xs : seq (nid * bool) ps : seq nat_eqType x : nat_eqType |- eqType] ?s : [xs : seq (nid * bool) ps : seq nat_eqType x : nat_eqType |- seq ?T] ?t : [xs : seq (nid * bool) ps : seq nat_eqType x : nat_eqType |- seq ?T]
memPnC : reflect {in ?A, forall y : ?T1, ?x != y} (?x \notin ?A) where ?T1 : [xs : seq (nid * bool) ps : seq nat_eqType x : nat_eqType |- eqType] ?A : [xs : seq (nid * bool) ps : seq nat_eqType x : nat_eqType |- pred ?T1] ?x : [xs : seq (nid * bool) ps : seq nat_eqType x : nat_eqType |- Equality.sort ?T1]
Tagged : forall T_ : ?I -> Type, T_ ?i -> {x : ?I & T_ x} where ?I : [xs : seq (nid * bool) ps : seq nat_eqType x : nat_eqType |- Type] ?i : [xs : seq (nid * bool) ps : seq nat_eqType x : nat_eqType |- ?I]
tagged : forall w : {x0 : ?I & ?T_ x0}, ?T_ (ssrfun.tag w) where ?I : [xs : seq (nid * bool) ps : seq nat_eqType x : nat_eqType |- Type] ?T_ : [xs : seq (nid * bool) ps : seq nat_eqType x : nat_eqType |- ?I -> Type]
allP : reflect {in ?s, forall x0 : ?T, ?a x0} (all ?a ?s) where ?T : [xs : seq (nid * bool) ps : seq nat_eqType x : nat_eqType |- eqType] ?a : [xs : seq (nid * bool) ps : seq nat_eqType x : nat_eqType |- pred ?T] ?s : [xs : seq (nid * bool) ps : seq nat_eqType x : nat_eqType |- seq ?T]
predCk : forall V : Type, ?K -> simpl_pred (?K * V) where ?K : [xs : seq (nid * bool) ps : seq nat_eqType x : nat_eqType |- ordType]
predk : forall V : Type, ?K -> simpl_pred (?K * V) where ?K : [xs : seq (nid * bool) ps : seq nat_eqType x : nat_eqType |- ordType]
Deprecation.hide : forall u : unit -> unit -> unit, Deprecation.exposed ?T u -> Deprecation.hidden ?T where ?T : [xs : seq (nid * bool) ps : seq nat_eqType x : nat_eqType |- Type]
perm_map : forall (T1 T2 : eqType) (f : T1 -> T2) (s t : seq T1), perm_eq s t -> perm_eq [seq f i | i <- s] [seq f i | i <- t]
perm_map_inj : forall (T1 T2 : eqType) (f : T1 -> T2), injective f -> forall s t : seq T1, perm_eq [seq f i | i <- s] [seq f i | i <- t] -> perm_eq s t
last_ins' : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (x : K) (v : V) (s : seq (K * V)), path ord x [seq key i | i <- s] -> ins' x v s = (x, v) :: s
notin_filter : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (x : K) (s : seq (K * V)), x \notin [seq key i | i <- s] -> [seq x0 <- s | predk V x x0] = [::]
allpairs_uniq : forall (S T R : eqType) (f : S -> T -> R) (s : seq S) (t : seq T), let st := [seq (x, y) | x <- s, y <- t] in uniq s -> uniq t -> {in st &, injective (prod_curry f)} -> uniq [seq f x y | x <- s, y <- t]
tallyE : forall (T : eqType) (s : seq T), perm_eq (tally s) [seq (x, count_mem x s) | x <- undup s]
map_allpairs : forall (S : Type) (T : S -> Type) (R R' : Type) (g : R' -> R) (f : forall x : S, T x -> R') (s : seq S) (t : forall x : S, seq (T x)), [seq g i | i <- [seq f x y | x <- s, y <- t x]] = [seq g (f x y) | x <- s, y <- t x]
seq.map_comp : forall (T1 T2 T3 : Type) (f1 : T2 -> T3) (f2 : T1 -> T2) (s : seq T1), [seq (f1 \o f2) i | i <- s] = [seq f1 i | i <- [seq f2 i | i <- s]]
filter_map : forall (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T2) (a : pred T2) (s : seq T1), [seq x <- [seq f i | i <- s] | a x] = [seq f i | i <- s & preim f a i]
sorted_filter' : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (k : K) (s : seq (K * V)), sorted ord [seq key i | i <- s] -> sorted ord [seq key i | i <- s & predCk V k i]
map_rotr : forall (n0 : nat) (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T2) (s : seq T1), [seq f i | i <- rotr n0 s] = rotr n0 [seq f i | i <- s]
eq_in_map : forall (T1 : eqType) (T2 : Type) (f1 f2 : T1 -> T2) (s : seq T1), {in s, f1 =1 f2} < -> [seq f1 i | i <- s] = [seq f2 i | i <- s]
map_inj_in_uniq : forall (T1 T2 : eqType) (f : T1 -> T2) (s : seq T1), {in s &, injective f} -> uniq [seq f i | i <- s] = uniq s
fcat_ins' : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (k : K) (v : V) (s1 : finMap K V) (s2 : seq (K * V)), k \notin [seq key i | i <- s2] -> fcat' (ins k v s1) s2 = ins k v (fcat' s1 s2)
count_map : forall (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T2) (a : pred T2) (s : seq T1), count a [seq f i | i <- s] = count (preim f a) s
all_map : forall (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T2) (a : pred T2) (s : seq T1), all a [seq f i | i <- s] = all (preim f a) s
allpairs_uniq_dep : forall (S : eqType) (T : S -> eqType) (R : eqType) (f : forall x : S, T x -> R) (s : seq S) (t : forall x : S, seq (T x)), let st := [seq Tagged (fun x0 : S => T x0) y | x <- s, y <- t x] in let g := fun p : {x : S & T x} => f (ssrfun.tag p) (tagged p) in uniq s -> {in s, forall x : S, uniq (t x)} -> {in st &, injective g} -> uniq [seq f x y | x <- s, y <- t x]
rot_to : forall (T : eqType) (s : seq_predType T) (x : T), x \in s -> rot_to_spec s x
contra : forall c b : bool, (c -> b) -> ~~ b -> ~~ c
undup = fun T : eqType => fix undup (s : seq T) : seq T := match s with | [::] => [::] | x :: s' => if x \in s' then undup s' else x :: undup s' end : forall T : eqType, seq T -> seq T Arguments undup {T} _%seq_scope
sorted_filter : forall (T : Type) (leT : rel T), transitive leT -> forall (a : pred T) (s : seq T), sorted leT s -> sorted leT [seq x <- s | a x]
Record finMap (K : ordType) (V : Type) : Type := FinMap { seq_of : seq (K * V); _ : is_true (sorted ord [seq key i | i <- seq_of]) } Arguments finMap _ _%type_scope Arguments FinMap [K] [V]%type_scope [seq_of]%seq_scope
mem_cat : forall (T : eqType) (x : T) (s1 s2 : seq T), (x \in s1 ++ s2) = (x \in s1) || (x \in s2)
mem_head : forall (T : eqType) (x : T) (s : seq T), x \in x :: s
msg_in_soup = fun (from to : nid) (criterion : nat -> seq nat -> bool) (d : soup) => (exists ! i : mid, exists (t : nat) (c : seq nat), find i d = Some {| content := {| tag := t; tms_cont := c |}; from := from; to := to; active := true |}) /\ (forall (i : mid) (t : nat) (c : seq nat), find i d = Some {| content := {| tag := t; tms_cont := c |}; from := from; to := to; active := true |} -> criterion t c) : nid -> nid -> (nat -> seq nat -> bool) -> soup -> Prop Arguments msg_in_soup _ _ _%function_scope
in_cons : forall (T : eqType) (y : T) (s : seq T) (x : T), (x \in y :: s) = (x == y) || (x \in s)
iota_addl : forall m1 m2 n : nat, iota (m1 + m2) n = [seq m1 + i | i <- iota m2 n]
perm_tally_seq : forall (T : eqType) (bs1 bs2 : seq (T * nat)), perm_eq bs1 bs2 -> perm_eq (tally_seq bs1) (tally_seq bs2)
bigop.mem_index_iota : forall (m n : nat) (i : nat_eqType), (i \in bigop.index_iota m n) = (m <= i < n)
eqb_id : forall b : bool_eqType, (b == true) = b
```intros xs ps x H1 H2. intros H3 H4. apply has_all_true in H3; try assumption. apply mapP in H3 as [a Ha ->]. exists a. apply H4. exact: Ha.```

original: intros xs ps x H1 H2. intros H3 H4. apply has_all_true in H3; try auto. apply mapP in H3 as [a Ha ->]. exists a. apply H4. exact: Ha.
